actionCalls.description: Transform the IN formatted collection to a comma separated string so it can be used in a soql query

actionCalls.description: take the user input values and parse them to a collection based on the delimiter variable

assignments.description: set values for each add product requested - includes the user entered key, a simple counter, and formatting for in query
assignments.name: Build_Add_Product_records_from_user_input
assignments.label: Build Add Product records from user input

decisions.description:
Decision to handle the addproductrequested and product query comparison.
If none, allow user to requery or skip. If single product, add to collection. If multiple, prompt user to select the correct one
decisions.name: RequestedProductFound
decisions.label: RequestedProductFound?

formulas.description: formats Value -> 'Value' so it can be used in an IN soql query
formulas.name: formatInputForInQuery
INQuery
formulas.expression: "select id, " & IF({!queryScope} = 'Name', "" , {!queryScope} & ",") & " name, Product2Id" & " from PricebookEntry where " & {!queryScope} & " in (" & {!Format_SOQL_IN_Query.csvString} & ") and Product2.Restrict_User_Access_to_Product__c = false and Pricebook2Id='" & {!GetQuote.SBQQ__PricebookId__c} & "'" & " and Product_External_ID__c != NULL and CurrencyIsoCode = '" & TEXT({!GetQuote.CurrencyIsoCode}) & "' and Product2.Pricing_Division_Code__c in (" & {!Convert_Pricing_Division_Collection_to_String.csvString} & ")"

formulas.name: querySingleProduct
formulas.expression: "select id, name, Product2id, " & {!queryScope} & " from PricebookEntry where " & {!queryScope} & " like '" & {!Text_for_research} & "' and Pricebook2Id='" & {!GetQuote.SBQQ__PriceBook__c} & "'"

loops.description: Loop through each user requested input
loops.name: Loop_through_input_collection
loops.label: Loop through input collection

fields.name: multipleproductsinstructions
fields.fieldText: We found multiple products matching that {!queryScope}. Please select a product below to continue.

fields.name: Description
fields.fieldText: To add multiple products to the Quote, please select Catalog Number if you do not know the Part Number. Then paste your values into the box below based on your delimiter.

fields.name: fault
fields.fieldText:
We were unable to find a match for: {!Loop_Through_AddProductsRequestedCollection.User_Entered_Product_Key__c}


Whoops, something went wrong. We didn't find any records for your search. Please try again.


If the issue persists, please contact the Salesforce Admin with the following details:



"Add Product Request failed at Find Records in Collection"

fields.name: Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Whoops, no product was found using that {!Select_Scope}.


You searched for: {!Loop_Through_AddProductsRequestedCollection.User_Entered_Product_Key__c}

fields.name: Choice
fields.fieldText: How do you want to proceed?

fields.name: queryinstructions
fields.fieldText: Find a new Product by searching for a new {!Select_Scope} below:

fields.name: Instructionsfortext
fields.fieldText:
Tips:

-use % for a wildcard. For example '1%' will return 1, 10, 100, etc.
